request.explain: Explain why do you want to be a mod:

text.default: Both fields must be completed for your request.

text.ok: Your request has been sent. Thank you for contacting us.
text.error: There was a mistake on your request. Please, try again later.

code.p-1: If you are on this page, this means you were selected to be part of blog mern's mod crew. Please type in the code that you have received by e-mail to finally update your role and become a new mod.
code.label-2: Confirm your code by typing it again here:
code.p-2: Having a mod role means that you will have to maintain order and follow the main rules of this page. If you do something that goes against them your role will be immediately taken off of you.

text.text: Once your role is updated, you will have to log in again.
text.incomplete: Please, insert the code in both input fields.
text.ok: Role has been updated. Thanks for your request.
text.error: Error: Inserted codes do not match. Please, type them in correctly.

request.p-1: If you accept this request, you will turn this normal user into a mod. Please verify the user's account and intentions before taking a decision including PROFILE, ENTRIES, COMMENTS and FRIENDS.
request.p-2: If this user turned into a mod ends up doing something against the page or others, it will be YOUR responsibility.
